text: Is this your most often comment?

name: rowboat
text:
Yeah. Kind of a catch phrase.

It's never malicious, but I always mean it.

text: A birthday the day after mine. For that, I give it a 5.

text: On Pi Day, even.

name: ovenface
text: on this day, chris got a baby. also on this day, i bought myself a delicious pumpkin pie.

name: ovenface

name: tourach3
text: i am glad to see that i am not the only person who celebrates pi day!

name: charchar
text:
I felt so quirky and unique at my old school and this year, well, Pi Day was on the morning announcements. (Today is Pi Day, 2008 for historical reference).

God, I hate being among people who get me.

name: relaxing
text: I realize this is not a good comic as such, but man, harsh!

text: I belive the birth of a child deserves a 5 you heartless bastards

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, zcross00, saddestking, Endquote, howl, atticusonline, Art-Vader, LaserBlade, Doc_Rostov, gnjdfsgk)

name: direhaggis
text: Evil, no. But you are being lame and evil. Onstad is allowed to reproduce occasionally.

name: spinynorman
text: Man, what the fuck parasite has gotten into your brain and made these things fall out of your mouth? It is concentrated crazy juice that is dripping out of my screen.

name: autrepoupee
text:
oh ho ho myes mortal fools that these HUMAN MAGGOTS are oh how loathe i am to thee if only but they had one neck to wring oh ho ho!
**soticoto bellows from the top of a dark tower in mordor, beats up football team**

oh sorry guys i'm just writing some fan fiction about a dude on the internet who either has a really clever gimmick wherein he pretends to be the lamest "internet evil" character ever, or he is really a Stupid Person with Stupid Thoughts.

You never know until the end of the fiction!

name: sp1derbaby
text: I'm picturing this as a musical, complete with a self-realisation/cutting/redemption medley.

name: tragicone
text: Its even more funny when you realize I am the greatest internet evil. OOOoooOOOoooOOOooohhh.

name: gunsofray
text: Yes.

name: charchar
text:
Have you considered that maybe Onstad is mortal, and the propagation of his awesome is awesome?

Also, shut up.
